name: cerb.mailRouting.recipientRules
description: Route email to a group based on recipient email patterns
script:
inputs:
  text/group_name:
    type: freeform
    required@bool: yes
    snippet:
      group_name: Support
  array/email_patterns:
    required@bool: yes
    snippet:
      email_patterns@list:
        billing@cerb.example
        support@*

start:
  decision:
    outcome:
      if@bool:
        {{array_matches(email_recipients, inputs.email_patterns) ? 'yes'}}
      then:
        return:
          group_name: {{inputs.group_name}}
